text:
[Verse]
Splashing puddles in my shoes
Skipping beats that life just threw
Sky is gray but hearts are true
Dancing in the rain with you

[Verse 2]
Lightning strikes but we don’t care
Raindrops fall like crystal air
Laughter echoes everywhere
In the rain our love to share

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh yeah
With you feels like we’re flying high
Every drop’s a sweet caress
Underneath the stormy sky

[Verse 3]
Wet clothes stick but spirits glide
Hiding from a world inside
In this dance we won’t confide
In your arms we’ll slide and glide

[Verse 4]
Thunder rumbles distant lies
We twirl under tempest skies
In the storm where dreams arise
Dancing till the morning ties

[Bridge]
Raindrops fall
Hear our call
We won't stall
Love stands tall
title: Dancing in the Rain
